definition[0]: to move the parts of a machine in order to try to make it work or repair it
example[0]: I’ve been fiddling around with this old car for months but I still can’t get it to work.
definition[1]: to make small unnecessary changes to something – used to show disapproval
example[1]: Why did you let her fiddle about with the remote control?
example[2]: The bus company is always fiddling around with the schedules.
